short_summary: Scientific services for DOI to monitor and conserve marine ecosystems
description: The Department of Fisheries and Oceans Canada (DFO) Marine Planning and Conservation Program intends to establish a Supply Arrangement for the provision of scientific services involving a knowledge of and technical support for a broad range of marine fish, fisheries, invertebrates, birds, marine mammals, and habitats in the waters of Newfoundland and Labrador. Individual projects will be related to monitoring of existing or proposed conservation areas, as well as contributing to broader Marine Planning and Conservation Program priorities.
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## [F6160-210004-C] Marine Planning and Conservation Program

### Reference Number | Numéro de Ressource*: WS3983186173-DOC3986849203

*This reference number identifies a contract established under the Departmental Supply Arrangement (DSA) Framework*

### Open Tender | Bidding Application Deadline: 
2023-05-24T14:00:00 (14:00 ET)

The Department of Fisheries and Oceans Canada intends to establish a Supply Arrangement for the provision of scientific services and technical support for marine planning and conservation programs in Newfoundland and Labrador.

### Description
The objective is to deliver a variety of marine conservation and management-related services, including:

- Monitoring and research of fisheries and marine habitats
- Support for Marine Protected Areas and Marine Refuges
- Contribution to broader marine conservation priorities

Contracting Entity
-------------------
**Department of Fisheries and Oceans Canada**
**11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau QC K1A 0S5 Canada**

Contact Information
-------------------
**Rhonda Lacey** (SPAC/PSPC)
rhonda.lacey@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

Notice URL
-------------
[http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16131893?extsite=MTYxMzE4OTNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16131893?extsite=MTYxMzE4OTNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

Regions of Delivery
-------------------
Newfoundland and Labrador

* Free trade agreements apply.
* Government of Canada's classification code: "78110000 - Passenger transport"
* Procurement method: Competitive Bid

This notice pertains to an expired tender. 

*Expired tenders are generally closed for bid-placing. However, government agencies maintain records of expired tenders for transparent and future reference.* 

Please do not initiate the bidding process for this contract.  In the interest of transparency, access this tender entry as a reference point only. 

Please consult the Government of Canada's tender website for eligible procurements and relevant bid-placing opportunities: [https://buyandsell.gc.ca/procurement-data/tender-notice](https://buyandsell.gc.ca/procurement-data/tender-notice)
